thread.title: Audrey Olivia, A New Lingerie Brand, Features Size-Inclusive, Nude Bras For Different Skin Tones
thread.title_full: Audrey Olivia, A New Lingerie Brand, Features Size-Inclusive, Nude Bras For Different Skin Tones

title: Audrey Olivia, A New Lingerie Brand, Features Size-Inclusive, Nude Bras For Different Skin Tones
text: By Gillian Fuller March 22, 2017 For something so ubiquitous, lingerie is surprisingly difficult to get right. Fortunately, it is getting easier—more and more companies are beginning to offer extended sizing, for instance—but the mass market is still, by and large, designed to accommodate only a small percentage of women. Lingerie designer Psyche Terry is looking to change that. Her eponymous label, Inspire Psyche Terry , already offers affordable underthings in a a wide range of sizes (bras are available in 36DD to 40DDD, while lingerie ranges from small to 4X). Now, she’s tackling the issue of diversity in the fashion industry , with her newest label Audrey Olivia. You May Also Like Lifestyle Model Joby Bach Cut a Body Suit to Make it Fit Named after Terry’s daughter, Audrey Olivia is designed specifically for larger-busted women and women of color, both of which "[have] previously gone under-served," according to the designer. Currently, Audrey Olivia offers four distinct shades designed to match tanned and darker complexions (from “Frappe,” a lighter, creamy tan, to “Black Coffee,” a deep blackish-brown). Terry says her idea to launch the label came largely from her own experiences as a consumer. "The idea was to create a line under the Inspire umbrella focusing on the overlooked market gap of bras in varying shades of nude for the DD-DDD woman, at a truly affordable price point," she tells Allure . "As a woman who has personally fluctuated in size from a B cup to a G cup and back to B again, I’ve experienced firsthand the frustration of trying to find supportive, stylish and affordable bras to accommodate all of my sizes." Courtesy of Brand
